p: A549 cells were used in the cytotoxicity and cellular uptake experiments of the AMF-loaded TPGS/soluplus mixed micelles. A549 cells were cultured in F-12 medium containing 1% penicillin–streptomycin and 10% fetal bovine serum. And the cells were maintained in an incubator at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2.
